select * from ( select ID,OPER_TIME,IP_ADDTRESS,USER_ID,USER_NAME, FUNC_NAME,ACTION_TYPE from SYS_LOG where OPER_TIME >= #OPER_STIME# and OPER_TIME <= #OPER_ETIME#
IP_ADDTRESS like '%$IP_ADDTRESS$%'
USER_ID like '%$USER_ID$%'
FUNC_NAME like '%$FUNC_NAME$%'
ACTION_TYPE = #ACTION_TYPE#
) aa limit $_startNum_$,$_stepRange_$

select count(*) as TOTAL_COUNT from ( select ID,OPER_TIME,IP_ADDTRESS,USER_ID,USER_NAME, FUNC_NAME,ACTION_TYPE from SYS_LOG where OPER_TIME >= #OPER_STIME# and OPER_TIME <= #OPER_ETIME#
IP_ADDTRESS like '%$IP_ADDTRESS$%'
USER_ID like '%$USER_ID$%'
FUNC_NAME like '%$FUNC_NAME$%'
ACTION_TYPE = #ACTION_TYPE#
) aa
select ID,OPER_TIME,IP_ADDTRESS,USER_ID,USER_NAME, FUNC_NAME,ACTION_TYPE from SYS_LOG where ID = #ID#
